item.title: Rubbish in park, 16th July
item.description:
Hi. What is happening with Shaftesbury park at the moment. This is the stream. Just parts of it. Theres more further along. There is general litter across the grass. And then we have the lime bike issue. A few weeks ago one was set alight in the trees at the back. More than likely at the same time they destroyed the childrens play area. Once again today 2 teenagers were disturbed doing it to yet another lime bike at the back of property walls. Why are these bikes being left in the stream and in the park allowing these mindless teenagers to have access to them and cause criminal damage? Im worried for the safety if the trees catch fire in these dry conditions then there will be a bigger issue. We are about to hit summer holidays and I fear it will get worse.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Alexandra Crescent, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet
